# datadog_team_hierarchy_links (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about existing Datadog Team Hierarchy Links.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `filter_parent_team` (String) Filter by parent team ID.
- `filter_sub_team` (String) Filter by sub team ID.
- `link_id` (String) The team hierarchy linkâ€™s identifier.

- `provisioned_by` (String) The provisioner of the team hierarchy link.
